forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. East wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening embraces Downtown San Francisco, a solitary peace wraps the streets, soothed by the gentle caress of a north-northwest breeze. The night hangs coolly, under a delicate tapestry of partly cloudy skies, while twilight diminishes to an inviting low of 44 degrees. There’s a hushed splendor in the air, an anticipation for the day that awaits, lending quiet joy to those who wander with purpose or simply lose themselves in the quiet allure of the city.

Tomorrow promises a partly sunny affair, with a high gently reaching 56 degrees, before tapering off towards 54 in the afternoon. The fabric of the day will be woven with soft whispers of an easterly breeze, allowing for glimpses of light that dance upon the faces of building façades and streets. Though the marine layer may weave its mist among the hills, obscuring sections of the Golden Gate, the day exudes a charm; perfect for a leisurely stroll. Dress in layers to embrace the coolness of the morning and match the warmth of the midday sun, perhaps opting for a light jacket over a favorite sweater. Consider a gentle walk through nearby parks, where stories are told through the rustling leaves, or a visit to a quaint café, where warmth meets the comfort of a good book. The night might call for a serene detour towards a familiar bend in the bay, where the soft hum of the city can be met with the soothing breath of the water.
